articles.description: Montana, which legalized recreational marijuana in November 2020, has experienced a booming cannabis industry, with sales reaching $203 million in its first year. Keith Regier, R-Kalispell, has sparked debate as it aims to eliminate adult-use dispensaries and significantly alter Montana’s marijuana marketplace. Understanding Senate Bill 546 [...]
